CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 接近；几乎；差不多；将近；近乎；在附近；不久之后；很快；紧挨着；贴近；距离不远
在…附近；临近；近似；（质量、大小等）相仿；接近于（某种状态）；几乎；差不多；将近；快要；即将；就要；（用于数词前）大约；上下
近的；接近的；邻近的；亲近的；近似的；相似的；不远；近似；近路边的；近侧的；近端的；距离近
接近；趋近；接近于（某个状态、程度或数量）；差不多达到；濒临；逐渐接近

word_mean_info__list.difference: 语气弱于close，也指时间或空间上的接近，但无“紧接，接触”的含义。
指距离上很近，近在咫尺。
语气强于near。指时间、地点或程度方面的接近，有紧靠、相邻的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 极险的事, 死里逃生；侥幸做成的事
至亲；至爱；最亲密的亲友

word_group.phrase: so near and yet so far

word_group.brief_definition: 侥幸避开的相撞；几乎命中的炸弹；靠近弹；近距脱靶；侥幸避过的事物；侥幸脱险；死里逃生；几乎成功的事；功亏一篑的事
伤人的；令人不舒服的；近乎下流的
迎风航行；行为几失检点；近乎不老实；濒临险境
侥幸避开的相撞；几乎命中的炸弹；近距脱靶

bilingual.source: It's near here, so you can walk there.
bilingual.target: 它就在附近，你可以走过去。

bilingual.source: There is a park near my house.
bilingual.target: 我家在附近有一个公园。

bilingual.source: We found a parking spot near here.
bilingual.target: 我们在附近找到了一个停车位。

bilingual.source: There is a coffee shop near the school.
bilingual.target: 学校在附近有一家咖啡店。

bilingual.source: Do you know any good restaurants near here?
bilingual.target: 你知道在附近有好吃的餐馆吗？

bilingual.source: There is a supermarket near here where we can shop.
bilingual.target: 在附近有一个超市，我们可以去那里买东西。
苏珊： 不， 他就住在附近。

bilingual.source: And we could see deer from near.
bilingual.target: 而且在附近我们还看到了鹿。

list.abstract: 尼亚，日本动漫《死亡笔记》以及同名动画、电影中的人物，是L的继承者。喜欢玩拼图模型，一边游戏玩具一边分解玩具，特征是衣服与头发统一的白色，单脚放在椅子上卷自己的头发等等。 他思考时爱用手指卷玩自己的头发，喜欢蹲坐着，爬着，极少见站起来。坐着的时候爱把左脚撑起。左手搭在左膝盖上，和L一样蹲在沙发上。 在影视作品中，该角色由優希美青饰演。

yingyinNormal.en: They told me not to go near the Red Flower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们跟我说要离红色的花远一点。

yingyinNormal.en: We'd like a booth over there, near the philodendron. Good, right? Near the philodendron.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要那边的卡座，那盆景边。很不错吧？在盆景边。

yingyinNormal.en: See, I could've said "In the near future," but I didn't say "In the near future," 'cause "In the near future" is three more words than "Soon."
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看，我本来可以说"快开始了"，但我没有说"快开始了"，因为"快开始了"比"快"多了3个字。

yingyinNormal.en: We are near the nesting ground of the Amazon wood quail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们已经接近亚马逊林鹑的栖息地。

yingyinNormal.en: There's a MI-6 safe house near here. I have a contact there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这附近有军情六处的安全屋，那里有我熟识的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Until 1944. Then you were moved to a smaller camp near Krakw?
yingyinNormal.zh: 直到1944年。然后你被调到克拉科夫附近一个较小的集中营？（波兰城市）

yingyinNormal.en: You are welcome. Have a lovely holiday. Are we near there yet?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用客气。祝你们一家玩的开心！爸爸，我们快到了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: "In" one, "the" two, "near" three, "future" four. See "In the near future" is four, "Soon" is just one, four is more than one; saving time already.
yingyinNormal.zh: "快"是1，"开"是2，"始"是3，"了"是4。"快开始了"4个字，而"快"是1个字。1字比4字少，所以就省下了时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Tsu'tey is Olo'eyktan now. He's not gonna let you near that place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 苏泰现在是族长了，他可不会让你接近那地方。

yingyinNormal.en: My passion bubble's very near the surface, I guess, not gonna lie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大概是因为我的怒气细胞特别发达，我就是这么想的，没骗你。

yingyinNormal.en: She said if I came near her, she would break the bottle and cut me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她说如果我敢靠近她，她就敲碎瓶子捅我。

yingyinNormal.en: How can you help them when they won't let anyone near the blast site?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不许任何人接近爆炸地点，你怎么能帮他们？

yingyinNormal.en: Why are we stopping? For many, a near-miss with death is a wake-up call.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们为什么停下？对许多人来说，濒死体验是一种警钟。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, when was the last time you saw her? Tuesday. Her locker's near me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，上次你看到她是什么时候？呃，周二。她的柜子在我隔壁。

yingyinNormal.en: Ross, that was not a near-death experience. That was barely an experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯，那不是濒死经验，就连经验都谈不上了。

yingyinNormal.en: You like it now. Just wait. It's wicked fast and damn near impossible to see.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊，先别着急，瞧着吧，它飞得贼快，你都没法看清。

yingyinNormal.en: But when a man misses his own near-miss, he truly sees what he's been missing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但当你差一点就没赶上，差一点就死的体验才会真正醒悟自己错失了什么。

yingyinNormal.en: It's older than that. Ross was actually conceived right near this tuxedo. Ohh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这比30年还老，罗斯是在这件燕尾服旁受孕的。

yingyinNormal.en: Ha! That's like saying the people near the nuclear explosion didn't do so well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哈，就像是那些经历过核爆炸的人也会出毛病。

yingyinNormal.en: You always said we're not supposed to go near a man village. That was different.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你总是跟我说我们不应该靠近人类的村子。现在不一样了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 接近；几乎；差不多；差点儿；密切地；亲密地

word_family.mean: adv. 近；在附近；不久；很快；近乎；差不多；几乎

sense_info_list.en: at or to a short distance away

examination_example.sentence: In one series of studies, researchers instructed Chicago-area commuters using public transportation to strike up a conversation with someone <highlight>near</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一系列的研究中，研究者们通知芝加哥地区乘用公共交通的通勤者开始一段和周围人的交流。

examination_example.sentence: And where is the <highlight>nearest</highlight> water source?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的水源在哪里？

examination_example.sentence: American archaeologists spent years systematically mapping the entire city of Teotihuacán in the Valley of Mexico <highlight>near</highlight> what is now Mexico City.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国考古学家花了数年时间系统地绘制了整个特奥蒂瓦坎古城的地图，这个城市位于墨西哥山谷，靠近现在的墨西哥城。

sense_info_list.en: a short time away in the future

examination_example.sentence: That's one reason why we have launched Arc, a new publication dedicated to the <highlight>near</highlight> future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是我们推出Arc的原因之一，Arc是一种致力于不久的将来的新出版物。

examination_example.sentence: Everyone wants to help you if you are trying to make a good change in your life, especially your dearest and <highlight>nearest</highlight> people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想改变你的生活，每个人都想帮助你，尤其是你最亲爱的和最亲近的人。

word_usage.usage: near也可以作动词，指人或事物在时间或空间上靠近、临近，多用于进行时，如：The project is nearing completion. 这项工程即将完工。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 接近；几乎；差不多；差点儿；密切地；亲密地

word_family.mean: adv. 近；在附近；不久；很快；近乎；差不多；几乎

sense_info_list.en: at or to a short distance away

examination_example.sentence: We easily recognize that there is great variation among the individuals who live <highlight>near</highlight> us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们很容易认识到，居住在我们附近的人之间有很大的差异。

examination_example.sentence: Digital humans are coming to a screen <highlight>near</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字人类来到你身边的屏幕前。

sense_info_list.en: a short time away in the future

examination_example.sentence: Whereas now, I <highlight>near</highlight> the end of my fourth decade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但现如今，我快要四十岁了。

examination_example.sentence: This sounds like so much hot air, but the <highlight>near</highlight> $13 billion fortune this entrepreneur has amassed comes from practical achievements rather than hypothetical ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这听起来像是夸夸其谈，但这位企业家积累的近130亿美元的财富来自实际成就，而非假想成就。

word_usage.usage:
near作形容词，表程度“接近的”时，多与介词to连用，在句中作表语（nearest除外）。
示例：After the war, he was near to bankruptcy.
战后，他濒于破产。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 语气强于 near。指时间、地点或程度方面的接近, 有紧靠、相邻的意味。
语气弱于 close, 也指时间或空间上的接近, 但无"紧接, 接触"的含义。
指距离上很近, 近在咫尺。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 接近；几乎；差不多；差点儿；密切地；亲密地

word_family.mean: adv. 近；在附近；不久；很快；近乎；差不多；几乎

sense_info_list.en: at or to a short distance away

examination_example.sentence: And yes, you read that right: There is a lunch box museum, right <highlight>near</highlight> the Chattahoochee River.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，你没看错：有一个午餐盒博物馆，就在查塔胡奇河附近。

examination_example.sentence: They decided in a vote of 89 to 78 to move from their land on Sarichef Island, <highlight>near</highlight> the Arctic Circle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们以89票对78票决定从北极圈附近的沙里切夫岛(Sarichef Island)迁出。

examination_example.sentence: A friend recently took her mother to visit an expensive assisted living/nursing home <highlight>near</highlight> my town.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位朋友最近带她妈妈去了我镇附近一家昂贵的养老院。

sense_info_list.en: a short time away in the future

examination_example.sentence: Although the narrow winners did get much more money in the <highlight>near</highlight> future, the actual performance of the close losers was just as good.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管在不久的将来，险胜者确实会获得更多的钱，但势均力敌的失败者的实际表现同样出色。

examination_example.sentence: I can't see myself getting an opportunity to progress at my company anytime in the <highlight>near</highlight> future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看不到自己在不远的未来有机会在公司取得进步。

examination_example.sentence: In addition, it is necessary to apply for graduation when you're <highlight>near</highlight> the time that you will be completing your graduation requirements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，当你即将完成毕业要求时，有必要申请毕业。

examination_example.sentence: But if gravity is removed, the beans float around in a heated oven, received 360 degrees of evenly distributed heat and roast to <highlight>near</highlight> perfection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是如果去掉重力，豆子会漂浮在加热的烤箱里，接受360度均匀分布的热量，并烘烤至接近完美。

examination_example.sentence: If the law isn't there, people will drive within their <highlight>near</highlight> ability range.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果法律不存在，人们会在他们的能力范围内驾驶。

examination_example.sentence: But other studies using the same technique have shown there's sometimes no penalty to a <highlight>near</highlight> miss.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但其他使用相同技术的研究表明，有时擦肩而过不会受到惩罚。

examination_example.sentence: In social sciences, this is known as examining "<highlight>near</highlight> misses" and "narrow wins" in areas where merit is subjective.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在社会学中，这被称为在主观价值的领域考察“侥幸”和“侥幸”。

examination_example.sentence: Brain scientists call this effect "asymmetric dominance" and it means that people gravitate toward the choice <highlight>nearest</highlight> a clearly inferior option.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大脑科学家称这种效应为“不对称优势”，这意味着人们倾向于最接近明显劣势的选择。

word_usage.usage:
near作形容词，表程度“接近的”时，多与介词to连用，在句中作表语（nearest除外）。
示例：After the war, he was near to bankruptcy.
战后，他濒于破产。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 语气强于 near。指时间、地点或程度方面的接近，有紧靠、相邻的意味。
语气弱于 close，也指时间或空间上的接近，但无"紧接，接触"的含义。
指距离上很近，近在咫尺。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 接近；几乎；差不多；差点儿；密切地；亲密地

word_family.mean: adv. 近；在附近；不久；很快；近乎；差不多；几乎

examination_example.sentence: As he was worried that it would be too warm, he laid it out on the table <highlight>near</highlight> an open window.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为担心太热，他把它放在靠近一扇开着的窗户的桌子上。

examination_example.sentence: Her voice was soft but confident as she pointed to the corner <highlight>near</highlight> the windows.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她指着靠近窗户的角落时，她的声音柔和而自信。

examination_example.sentence: The village lay <highlight>near</highlight> some wetlands which became his second home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个村庄位于一些湿地附近，那里成了他的第二个家。

examination_example.sentence: The team hopes to make it to market in the <highlight>near</highlight> future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该团队希望能在不久的将来将其推向市场。

examination_example.sentence: In these places patients can go to be <highlight>near</highlight> nature during their recovery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这些地方，病人可以在康复期间接近大自然。

examination_example.sentence: We now realize how important family is and how important it is to be <highlight>near</highlight> them, especially when you're raising children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在意识到家庭有多重要，和他们在一起有多重要，尤其是当你抚养孩子的时候。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 接近；几乎；差不多；差点儿；密切地；亲密地

word_family.mean: adv. 近；在附近；不久；很快；近乎；差不多；几乎

sense_info_list.en: at or to a short distance away

examination_example.sentence: Many plants are growing <highlight>near</highlight> the beavers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多植物生长在海狸附近。

examination_example.sentence: My father told me that there used to be a forest <highlight>near</highlight> our town.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我父亲告诉我，过去在我们镇附近有一片森林。

examination_example.sentence: Who wouldn't want to live <highlight>near</highlight> a river?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁不想住在河边呢?

sense_info_list.en: a short time away in the future

examination_example.sentence: With the rapid progress in high technology, 5G will be used around most parts of China in the <highlight>near</highlight> future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着高科技的快速发展，5G将在不久的将来在中国大部分地区使用。

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>near</highlight> future, there will be self-driving cars in our city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在不久的将来，我们的城市将会有自动驾驶汽车。

examination_example.sentence: We may see a smarter world and better lives in the <highlight>near</highlight> future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在不久的将来，我们可能会看到一个更智能的世界和更美好的生活。

examination_example.sentence: For me it comes down to a perfect balance of delicious food, pleasant atmosphere and a <highlight>near</highlight> perfect location.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对我来说，这归结于美味的食物、宜人的气氛和近乎完美的位置之间的完美平衡。

examination_example.sentence: He lay before the bird, <highlight>near</highlight> death.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他躺在鸟面前，快要死了。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, horses are their <highlight>nearest</highlight> relatives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，马是它们最近的亲戚。

word_usage.usage:
near作形容词，表程度“接近的”时，多与介词to连用，在句中作表语（nearest除外）。
示例：After the war, he was near to bankruptcy.
战后，他濒于破产。
